[docs]mag_band    = 'J'   #Band (J or V)


[docs]spt         = 'M6'  #spectral type


[docs]filt        = 'r' #Filter in use


[docs]exp_t       = 100    #Exposure time

[docs]seeing      = 0.95  #effective seeing [arcsec]


[docs]airmass     = 1.2   #Airmass


[docs]moonphase   = 0.6   #Moon phase (0.=new moon, 1.=full moon)
